https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qdNog6ueztBWUAw8tsKlebmngRu.jpg Rosario in the 80s. The disappearance of a man during the military dictatorship. Two young people from the court must do everything possible to solve the case while facing police corruption and various dangers that put their lives at risk. An Argentinian crime
